channel.title: spanish on no exceptions
channel.description: Recent content in spanish on no exceptions

item.title: Meaning it a thousand different ways
item.description: For the joy of doing something that is difficult for me Words that i picked up Hola - Hello Bien - OK Esta Bien - How are you? Te Amo - I love you Te Adoro - I adore you Te quiero - I love you tu - you Y - and (need to make sure this is true - often i hear it as response to esta bien? bien Y tu) Poetry Some of the poetry sounds so deep even when translated.
